title: Brawl Hero
description: Brawl Hero is an action game where you take charge of a heroic character to throw balls at enemies. Avoid enemies' attacks, defeat all of the enemies, and level up yourself! Venture to the town, where you can chop wood, excavate stones, or mine gems. Trade these materials with the Wandering Trader for powerups. Gather coins along your journey and exchange them for many thrilling upgrades.
